name: get-information-about-the-users-current-playback
description: Get information about the userâ€™s current playback state, including track or episode, progress, and active device.

market.description:
An [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2). If a country code is specified, only content that is available in that market will be returned.
If a valid user access token is specified in the request header, the country associated with the user account will take priority over this parameter.
_**Note**: If neither market or user country are provided, the content is considered unavailable for the client._
Users can view the country that is associated with their account in the [account settings](https://www.spotify.com/se/account/overview/).
market.title: Market

additional_types.description:
A comma-separated list of item types that your client supports besides the default `track` type. Valid types are: `track` and `episode`.
_**Note**: This parameter was introduced to allow existing clients to maintain their current behaviour and might be deprecated in the future._
In addition to providing this parameter, make sure that your client properly handles cases of new types in the future by checking against the `type` field of each object.
additional_types.title: Additional Types

**volume_percent**: The current volume in percent.
**is_playing**: If something is currently playing, return `true`.
**item**: The currently playing track or episode. Can be `null`.
**progress_ms**: Progress into the currently playing track or episode. Can be `null`.
